title: Ewa Majowska | Front-End Developer

meta_description.content: Ewa Majowska | Front-End Developer based in Saint Leu. Passionate about web development, design and digital art.

about:
Hey, I'm Ewa Majowska, a Front-End Developer based in Saint Leu, R√©union Island.

My passion for languages led me to graduate in English Philology and Japanese at Silesian University in Poland. Relocating to France motivated me to learn the local language and explore a new form of communication: the language of the web.

In my free time, I enjoy yoga, running, and some good brain puzzles, like board games with friends or escape rooms. My favorite way to relax, though, is digital painting while listening to a podcast!
skills:
From a young age, I was always drawn to both art and technology. I began with traditional drawing, transitioned to digital painting, and eventually found myself experimenting with design. As I progressed, I grew comfortable using tools such as Photoshop, Krita, and Figma.

Ultimately, my passion for  languages, design, and technology all came together in one place: web development. But it doesn‚Äôt stop there ‚Äî I‚Äôm always eager to pick up new skills!
